scripts.watch: npm run watch-index & npm run watch-poll & npm run watch-channel & npm run watch-dashboard
scripts.watch-index: watchify Public/jsx/index.jsx -v -o Public/js/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch-poll: watchify Public/jsx/poll.jsx -v -o Public/js/poll.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch-channel: watchify Public/jsx/channel.jsx -v -o Public/js/channel.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch-dashboard: watchify Public/jsx/dashboard.jsx -v -o Public/js/dashboard.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
